title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. for code to reproduce the problem. These tests have limitations and may return false positives due to filename checking not being enabled in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, the filename is omitted when it makes no sense to AJDT.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars is listed as 'app.Main.class'.
EB: In declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be listed as 'app/Main'.
SR: To reproduce the issue, generate declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars and check if the source path is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
